title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 20.2 - Record of attendance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 20.2 - Record of attendance

State Regulations

Daily time records showing actual hours worked by each
employee shall be maintained; provided, however, that the appointing authority
may, with the approval of the Department of Civil Service, exempt from this
requirement such executives, officers and employees who do not earn overtime as
it may designate. Employees exempt from maintaining daily time records showing
actual hours worked shall maintain a daily record of absences and time and
leave credits earned and used in accordance with this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
20.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
